project.name: productupvote
project.description: The main goal for the Product Up Vote app is to allow users to vote on a product that they like and get rewarded for their help. As users votes for the products and engages more with the website that will open the opportunity for them to win the product they have voted for. Product Up Vote will also allow users to submit products they have created or products they have found only that are not yet seen on Product Up Vote. The backend user will have an option to either accept, decline or put on hold the product that was submitted. On the website there is going to be a rewarding system if user is taking part on the website by submitting new products, users than will be rewarded with votes that they can be spent by either voting up more products or spend it on other features of the website. Product Up Vote is not only a product voting app but also it will provide shopping cart like functionality that will provide backend user with options such as listing products, allowing online payments, importing list of products from other sources e.g. eBay, amazon or other shopping cart. Every part of the website will be able to be modified by backend user for example: changing font, managing layout of the website, changing CSS or adding new functionalities. Application will also have analytics functionality that will record every user movement on front and backend. When enough data is collected than that information will be used to improve the websites performance. Plan for application is to allow website to be self-managing which means that little or none presence of the backend user will be need for the website to function.
